00011 GlutApplication::GlutApplication(int argc, char** argv, 
00012                 std::string windowTitle, int windowHeight, int windowWidth, 
00013                 int xWindowPosition, int yWindowPosition, unsigned int displayMode) :
00014                 windowTitle_(windowTitle),
00015                 windowHeight_(windowHeight),
00016                 windowWidth_(windowWidth),
00017                 xWindowPosition_(xWindowPosition),
00018                 yWindowPosition_(yWindowPosition),
00019                 displayMode_(displayMode)
00020 {
00021  
00022         // add thread safety to this constructor to insure that only one instance exists
00023         boost::call_once( &GlutApplication::initInstances, appOnceFlag);
00024         instances_++;
00025         assert( 1 == instances_ );
00026         glutInit(&argc, argv);
00027         glutInitDisplayMode( displayMode_ );
00028         glutInitWindowSize( windowWidth_, windowHeight );
00029         glutInitWindowPosition( xWindowPosition_, yWindowPosition_ );
00030         glutCreateWindow( windowTitle_.c_str() );
00031         //OnInit();
00032 
00033         // Register call backs
00034         glutDisplayFunc( &GlutApplication::OnDisplayCallWrapper );
00035         glutReshapeFunc( &GlutApplication::OnReshapeWindowCallWrapper );
00036         glutKeyboardFunc( &GlutApplication::OnKeyPressedCallWrapper );
00037         glutMouseFunc( &GlutApplication::OnMousePressedCallWrapper );
00038         glutMotionFunc( &GlutApplication::OnMouseDragCallWrapper );
00039         glutIdleFunc(  &GlutApplication::OnIdleCallWrapper );
00040 }
